name: METHYLERGONOVINE MALEATE
indications_original: Following delivery of the placenta, for routine management of uterine atony, hemorrhage and subinvolution of the uterus. For control of uterine hemorrhage in the second stage of labor following delivery of the anterior shoulder.
contraindications_original: Parenteral drug products should be inspected visually for particulate matter and discoloration prior to administration.
